frontmatter.title: Nearshoring in Context of Globally Distributed Software Engineering

node.html: As a part of our contribution to the Body of Knowledge of Globally Distributed Software Engineering, I along with my classmates came up with a three series blog on the topic of success and failure factors for offshoring and nearshoring.
Published an article titled "Object Detection For Simulated Cars". The article explained implementation of modified leNet model for object detection in autonomous cars.

frontmatter.title: Speed-up of Sequence Alignment Algorithms on CUDA GPU

node.html: Published a research article titled "Speed-up of Sequence Alignment Algorithms on CUDA Compatible GPUs". The aim of this paper is to provide a comprehensive comparison of serial and parallel implementations of well-known Longest Common Subsequence (LCS) algorithms and study their behaviour on different GPU architectures.
